mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions module¶

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptArgumentsError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Thrown when there is an arguments mismatch while calling a function

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptAttributeError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Thrown when an invalid property of an object is accessed

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.McScriptException.McScriptException

base McScript error

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptIsStaticError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Thrown when a static value is found in the wrong place

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptNameError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Describes an error while trying to access a variable. Can be thrown when a variable is not defined or when a property of an object does not exist.

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptNotImplementError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

thrown when something is not yet implemented

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptNotStaticError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Thrown when a const declaration is not possible because the value is not known at compile-time

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptSyntaxError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Thrown when invalid syntax is found that can not be validated using the grammar

exception mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptTypeError(message, compileState: CompileState)¶

Bases: mcscript.Exceptions.compileExceptions.McScriptError

Thrown when another type than expected was found
